trans-unit.source: Represents a layout control that aligns a bullet and another visual object.
trans-unit.target: 表示一种布局控件来将项目符号与另一个可视对象对齐。

trans-unit.source: BulletDecorator has two content properties: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: BulletDecorator 具有两个内容的属性︰<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> property defines the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to use as a bullet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>属性定义<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>要用作项目符号。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> property defines a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> that visually aligns with the bullet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>属性定义<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>直观地对齐带有项目符号。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> always aligns with the first line of text when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>始终对齐文本的第一行时的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>对象是一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object is not a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> aligns to the center of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>对象不是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>的中心对齐<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about layout of a BulletDecorator, see [How to: Create a BulletDecorator](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d9532e9a-a2a5-47b9-aa37-c36f841b34ae).
trans-unit.target: BulletDecorator 的布局的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 创建 BulletDecorator](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d9532e9a-a2a5-47b9-aa37-c36f841b34ae)。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows examples of BulletDecorator controls.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示 BulletDecorator 控件的示例。

trans-unit.source: ![3 BulletDecorators: CheckBox, RadioButton, TextBox](~/add/media/bulletdecorator.png "3 BulletDecorators: CheckBox, RadioButton, TextBox")
trans-unit.target: ![3 个 Bulletdecorator: CheckBox、 RadioButton、 TextBox](~/add/media/bulletdecorator.png "3 个 Bulletdecorator: CheckBox、 RadioButton、 TextBox")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the default content arrangement behavior for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 重写的默认内容排列行为<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The ArrangeOverride method determines the size and position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> objects.
trans-unit.target: ArrangeOverride 方法确定的大小和位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> is aligned vertically with the first line of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>替换为第一个行的垂直对齐<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>内容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The available <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to use to lay out the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 可用<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>用于进行布局的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The computed size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 计算的大小<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的背景色<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The Background property defines the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> to use to fill the area within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.
trans-unit.target: 后台属性定义<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>要用于填充内<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>区域</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>

trans-unit.source: For some parent layout elements, the area that is defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> may extend beyond its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> content.
trans-unit.target: 对于某些父布局元素，为定义的区域<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>可能会超出其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>内容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> is the single child of a cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> control, the Background property applies to the whole cell.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>中的单元格的单个子<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>控件，背景属性适用于整个单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: This occurs because the content in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> cell is stretched in all directions to fill the cell, by default.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为中的内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>单元格拉伸所有方向，以填充单元格，默认情况下。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: However, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>, the Background property only affects the actual content area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A><xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>的背景属性仅会影响实际的内容区域的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> ，</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator></xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>属性</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can enclose the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element.
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可以在将<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>元素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: The background color for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 背景色<> *1> 和<> *1> 的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object to use as the bullet in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用作项目符号中的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Bullet property is a content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control and defines the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to display as a bullet for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 项目符号属性是内容的属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>控制和定义<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>显示为项目符号<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: The bullet that is defined by setting the Bullet property to a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is the first visual element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control.
trans-unit.target: 定义项目符号属性设置为项目符号<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>是中的第一个可视元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The single <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element is the second visual element.
trans-unit.target: 单个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>元素是第二个可视元素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性元素用法``` ```

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> to use as the bullet.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>要用作项目符号。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the child element that is at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取位于指定索引处的子元素。

trans-unit.source: The visual child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 可视子元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: The specified index for the child element.
trans-unit.target: 子元素指定的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> child element that is at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>位于指定索引处的子元素。

trans-unit.source: index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: index小于 0。

trans-unit.source: -or- index is greater than or equal to .
trans-unit.target: -index大于或等于。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the logical child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个枚举器的逻辑子元素<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The logical child elements for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control include the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>控件包括<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>逻辑的子元素

trans-unit.source: If you set both properties, they are enumerated in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置这两个属性，它们枚举按以下顺序: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements is the same as the number of logical child elements.
trans-unit.target: 可视子元素的数目是相同的逻辑子元素数。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator that provides access to the logical child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器可访问的逻辑子元素<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the default measurement behavior for the objects of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 重写的对象的默认度量行为<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The upper <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> limit of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 上限<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>限制的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The required <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control, based on the size of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child*> objects.
trans-unit.target: 所需<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>为<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>基于大小的控制其<> *1> 和<> *1> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 呈现的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure that is sized for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> content.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建<xref:System.Windows.Rect>大小调整为适应的结构<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>内容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Rect>

trans-unit.source: This rectangular structure is displayed with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> color and no border.
trans-unit.target: 显示此矩形的结构与指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A>颜色和无边框。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of visual child elements for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取的可视子元素的数目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The VisualChildrenCount can be 0, 1, or 2.
trans-unit.target: VisualChildrenCount 可以是 0、 1 或 2。

trans-unit.source: If either the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element is defined, the VisualChildrenCount is 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>定义元素，VisualChildrenCount 为 1。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element are defined, the VisualChildrenCount is 2.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>元素都定义，VisualChildrenCount 为 2。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements is the same as the number of logical child elements.
trans-unit.target: 可视子元素的数目是相同的逻辑子元素数。

trans-unit.source: The number of visual elements that are defined for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 为定义的可视元素的数目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。
